thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: Felix Kruse
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Felix Kruse

author: Felix Kruse
title: Felix Kruse
text:
I bought a drone and a beamer in that shop and had two questions to the support. The support answered within few hours, so the support is quick, friendly and effective. The shippment was safe and properly packed and needed abotu three weeks to germany.
The payment was easy (PayPal) and the quality of the products was good.
Everything was really good with TomTop!
